lead_paragraph: A sports article on Wednesday about the N.B.A. draft lottery misstated, in some editions, the number of teams the Chicago Bulls leapfrogged to win the No. 1 pick. It was eight, not seven.
snippet: A sports article on Wednesday about the N.B.A. draft lottery misstated, in some editions, the number of teams the Chicago Bulls leapfrogged to win the No. 1 pick. It was eight, not seven.
